vcmi.name: VCMI essential files
vcmi.description: Essential files required for VCMI to run correctly
vcmi.author: VCMI Team

Korean TrueType Fonts.name: Korean True type fonts
Korean TrueType Fonts.description: Mod that replaces original bitmap fonts with similar Korean true type fonts
Korean TrueType Fonts.author: hwiorn

ai trace.name: Adventure AI trace
ai trace.description: Configures console log for extensive adventure AI debug info
ai trace.author: Warmonger

mac demo support.author: misiokles and SXX
mac demo support.name: MacOS demo assets support
mac demo support.description: With this mod enabled you can play using game data extracted from Heroes 3: Complete demo for Mac. All towns and creatures missing will be disabled, but be aware that most custom maps depend on them.

ai testing maps.name: VCMI maps for AI testing
ai testing maps.description: Following maps can be used for automatic testing of VCAI or any other adventure AI implementation in VCMI. Check README.md file for detailed documentation.
ai testing maps.author: SXX

campaign heroes.name: Campaign Heroes
campaign heroes.description: All 20 campaign heroes are now available in random maps
campaign heroes.author: avatar
